# packagepal

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of packagepal is to be a good pal for R package builders.

## Installation

You can install the development version of packagepal from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("lddurbin/packagepal")
```

## Get Started

To get started with packagepal, call the following function and follow the instructions:

```{r example, eval=FALSE}
packagepal::pal_start()
```
